urlAndDescriptions.name: Body Mass Index
urlAndDescriptions.description: It is a general indicator to tell you whether you have a healthy body weight for their height or not. BMI measures the person's leanness or corpulence based on his height and weight.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Body Fat Percentage
urlAndDescriptions.description: With the BFP calculator, you will know the amount of fat in your body, your body health condition through fat percentage and the ideal fat percentage you should have.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Body Shape
urlAndDescriptions.description: Body shape calculator helps you to determine your body type based on your body measurements.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Ideal Weight
urlAndDescriptions.description: Ideal weight helps you to determine your ideal body weight (IBW). It computes the ideal weight based on height, age and gender.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Basal Metabolic Rate
urlAndDescriptions.description: It estimates the basal metabolic rate which is the amount of energy the body expended while at rest. Use this calculator to find out your BMR and determine your caloric needs.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Healthy Weight
urlAndDescriptions.description: This calculator computes your healthy body weight range based on your height. It is more accurate for adults aged from 18 to more older.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Body Mass Index Women
urlAndDescriptions.textInHref: Body Mass Index BMI Calculator for Women

urlAndDescriptions.name: Body Mass Index Men
urlAndDescriptions.textInHref: Body Mass Index Calculator for Men

urlAndDescriptions.name: Random Number Generator
urlAndDescriptions.description: With this calculator you can  get a random, cryptographically safe number. It can generate random numbers which can be used for determining who will go first in a game

urlAndDescriptions.name: Percentage Calculator
urlAndDescriptions.description: It is a free online calculator to facilitate calculating percentages. It can find a percentage and work out the percentage given numbers and also percent values.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Percent Error Calculator
urlAndDescriptions.description: With the Percent Error Calculator you can calculate the percentage error between an observed and a true, or experimental value.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Binary Calculator
urlAndDescriptions.description: It can perform the many tasks as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division of two binary values, it also converts binary values to decimal values, and also vice versa.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Hex Calculator
urlAndDescriptions.description: With the Hex Calculator  you can perform the addition, subtraction, multiplication and division also on 2 hexadecimal numbers.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Age Calculator
urlAndDescriptions.description: With Age Calculator you can determine your age or the interval between two dates. It displayed age in years, months, weeks, days, also hours, minutes, and seconds.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Date Calculator
urlAndDescriptions.description: With the date calculator you can compute the period Between Two Dates. You can Find years, months, and Even days between two dates.

urlAndDescriptions.name: Time Calculator
urlAndDescriptions.description: It calculates the amount of time between times on 2 different dates. Use the time calculator to add or subtract time, even days, hours, minutes, seconds from the starting time and date.
